books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel set in the American South during the 1930s, focusing on the moral growth of Scout Finch as her father, Atticus, defends a black man falsely accused of raping a white woman.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother, where truth is subjective and manipulated by the Party.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A critique of the American Dream, the novel follows the life of Jay Gatsby and his obsession with the beautiful Daisy Buchanan during the Roaring Twenties.
